s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BRAKE MASTER CYLINDER RESERVOIR SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Remove the brake master cylinder reservoir from the brake master cylinder sub-assembly.
Remove the 2 master cylinder reservoir grommets from the brake master cylinder reservoir assembly.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BRAKE MASTER CYLINDER RESERVOIR FILLER CAP ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Remove the brake master cylinder reservoir filler cap assembly from the brake master cylinder reservoir assembly.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BRAKE MASTER CYLINDER RESERVOIR STRAINER

s2.ptxt: Remove the brake master cylinder reservoir strainer from the brake master cylinder reservoir assembly.
Push in the piston and remove the snap ring using snap ring pliers.
Push in the piston and remove the piston stopper bolt and gasket.
Remove the No.1 piston from the master cylinder body by pulling straight out.

atten3.ptxt: Do not scratch the inside of the cylinder body.

s2.ptxt: Tap the flanged part against wooden blocks until the end of the No. 2 piston comes out. When the end of the No. 2 piston comes out, pull the No. 2 piston straight out of the master cylinder body.

atten3.ptxt: Do not scratch the inside of the cylinder body.
